name: is_subclass_of
purpose: Checks if the object has this class as one of its parents

return.description:
This function returns TRUE if the object object,
   belongs to a class which is a subclass of 
   class_name, FALSE otherwise.

notes.description:
Using this function will use any registered 
autoloaders if the class is not already known.

changelog.change:
You may also specify the object parameter as a
        string (the name of the class)
